ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest]
ygData.msgSnippet: Not that I m on your server Tammy but wouldn t it be important that you two know each other s character s names before you two go on to look for each other?
ygData.messageBody:
Not that I'm on your server Tammy but wouldn't it be important that
you two know each other's character's names before you two go on to
look for each other? It would be cool if there was somoene that goes
on my server though that is on this Yahoo Groups. Just curious but
where do you all play at? I only have 1 character on the server I
play. I probably will switch to another server when I do make
another character, though.

Milase 48 druid
Vazaelle

--- In EverQuest@y..., Pedgar1787@a... wrote:
> I can be on tonight around 8 or 9 pacific time.
>
> Tammy
